'''Athelwood Metal Combat Shield''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Athelwood Metal Combat Shield is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] in [[Sumeru]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a [[Remarkable Chest]] after completing a [[Trial of the Soul Bell]] challenge in the mountain north of [[Tunigi Hollow]].
